description: For four years this Slovenian town has enjoyed its link to the First Lady but an era is about to end.
title: Melania Trump's hometown in Slovenia hopes its fame will last
title_page: Melania Trump's hometown in Slovenia hopes its fame will last - BBC News
maintext: "In our patisserie, we have a lot of people from all over the world - they all tried the Torta Melanija, but I don't think they just came for the cake," the owner remarks. "It was a big thing for us - a big thing for Slovenia as well. It was a historical moment - and I don't think that we will see such a moment again."
